scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build -w client; npm run build -w viewer
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w client; npm run lint -w server; npm run lint -w viewer
scripts.lint:changed: npm run lint:changed -w client; npm run lint:changed -w server; npm run lint:changed -w viewer
scripts.test: prettier --check . && npm run lint && CI=true npm test -w client && CI=true npm test -w server && CI=true npm test -w viewer
